text: num̆balāgē kāntāvan aturin ætæmun aśīlācāra kriyāvaka yedunē nam, ovunaṭa erehiva (varada oppu kirīmaṭa) num̆balā aturin siv deneku sākṣi vaśayen gena enu. esē ovun sākṣi pævasuvē nam eviṭa ovunaṭa maraṇaya eḷam̆bena turu hō ovun venuven allāh yam man̆gak æti karana turu niveshi ovun va ran̆davā tabanu
